meanings.definition: Having or causing an irritating sensation on the skin that makes you want to scratch.
meanings.sent1: My mosquito bites are so itchy that I can't stop scratching them.
meanings.sent2: The wool sweater made my skin feel itchy and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The itchy tag on my shirt kept poking me, making me fidget all day.
meanings.sent4: The idea of failing the test made him feel itchy with anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The poison ivy rash was so itchy that he wished he could just peel off his skin.

meanings.definition: A strong desire or craving for something.
meanings.sent1: Her sudden itchy for chocolate led her to raid the pantry.
meanings.sent2: The itchy for adventure drove him to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: His itchy for knowledge made him spend hours in the library.
meanings.sent4: The itchy for success pushed her to work hard towards her goals.
meanings.sent5: The itchy for travel made her pack her bags and head to the airport.
